name: Maithilee Potnis
reviews: Have been going to this gym since it started. All the trainers are very nice and the gym has a homely vibe. Have been taking personal training from faisal sir since past 3-4 years and he is very good. Have been able to loose a lot weight and gain my strength back thankx to him. He is very sincere in his efforts and very punctual too and will adjust your timings as and when he can. He will religiously persuade you to complete the sessions with full loyality and make sure you achieve your goals.All the other trainers deepak shinde who is the head trainer deepak khandagale mayur rohan kerekar sai kamble all are equally good. You have all d required equipment in the gym and with the help of trainers you can achieve your goals. One of the good gyms in the vicinity for sure.
feedback1: The gym has a homely vibe.
feedback2: Faisal sir is very good.
feedback3: He is very sincere in his efforts.

name: Chintan Makwana
reviews: DONT JOIN IF YOU ARE A FIRST TIME GYM GOER/NEWBEE/INEXPERIENCED. Subscribed for a yearly membership after hearing much hype about it being the best in Thane. But i was really disappointed specially from the point of view of a new member, i was never given that initial attention which is needed in the first week. On my first day I had to go by myself and ask trainer to give some schedule as a newbee. No exercise/progress card was made,inspite of me asking multiple times. No update on gym renovation closure was received on my registered mobile number. I lost the motivation. Trainers most of the time busy either watching TV or helping female members. Totally not worth the hype and also don't fall for the 50% monsoon offer. It is hardly few thousand bucks discount from the original cost. U wont recieve any call for retention if your membership is about to expire. They care a damn if u continue or leave.
feedback1: The customer is disappointed with the gym's service.
feedback2: The new member was never given initial attention.
feedback3: The customer was not provided with an exercise schedule.
neg_keywords: ['customer disappointed gym', 'disappointed gym service', 'disappointed gym', 'customer disappointed']

name: metali gupte
reviews:
Gold's Gym Thane has good ambience and equipments. However, weights are often scattered, and higher management doesn't seem to address this despite of multiple reminders. Members also work out in large groups, which creates issues for others waiting for their turn. Due to these reasons people prefer Gold's Gym Mulund which is much more systematic and advanced.

Addressing these problems would greatly improve the experience.
feedback1: The gym has good ambience and modern equipment.
feedback2: The management doesn't address scattered weights issues.
feedback3: The gym's systematic approach makes it a better choice.
pos_keywords: ['gym good ambience', 'ambience modern equipment', 'good ambience modern', 'gym good', 'ambience modern']

name: Amit Sabnis
reviews:
Somehow, over a course of last 5 years, Golds Gym in Thane has lost its charm and quality too. Moreover the cost of packages have sky-rocketed with not much appreciation or development on the gym floor and with same old machines.
A few exceptions like cross fit which are a trend look good. They still have the same approach on hiring a personal trainer which again costs you big buck. The regular trainers are always encouraging and motivating you to sign up into personal training, else ignoring you.
The discounts which happen yearly are not at all making any difference as they will lower the package cost only by 15% and are promoted as 50%.
They have to pull up their standard and be atleast little bit pocket friendly.
Only one Gold gym is currently functional in the city at Teen Hath Naka.
feedback1: The gym has lost its charm and quality over time.
feedback2: The cost of packages has increased significantly.
feedback3: The regular trainers are always encouraging and motivating.

name: Ritik Mangla
reviews:
One of the finest fitness centres in Thane City.

Professional and helpful staff, cleanliness and hygiene are well maintained with all COVID norms being followed. Equipments are amongst the best available publicly, in the city of Thane.

They also offer a 3 Day trial if you wish to get a better feel of the experience at Gold Gym. There's a nutritionist and a team of personal trainers who will certainly help you achieve all your fitness goals.
feedback1: The fitness centre is one of the finest in Thane City.
feedback2: The staff is professional and helpful, maintaining cleanliness and hygiene.
feedback3: The gym offers a 3 Day trial and personal trainers to achieve fitness goals.
pos_keywords: ['staff professional helpful', 'staff professional', 'professional helpful maintaining', 'professional helpful', 'gym offers day']
